DOC.brief_summary: Prospective observational clinical multicentric study in ICU with ventilated patients requiring chest ultrasound analysis.
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary and Cardiac Ultrasound During Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective observational clinical multicentric study on ICU ventilated patients requiring chest ultrasound analysis during weaning from mechanical ventilation with 48 hours of follow-up. Studying variations of cardiac markers
DOC.criteria: Adult patients ventilated more than 48 h Stable respiratory and hemodynamic conditions for SBT Consent of patients Arterial line Laryngeal dyspnea Tracheostomy Arythmya No echogenicity Paraplegia >T8
